auto-screenshot.name: Auto Screenshot
auto-screenshot.description: Automatically screenshot at a certain percentage (specified using the Auto Screenshot Percent setting)

auto-percent.name: Auto Screenshot Percent
auto-percent.description: The percentage that PRNTSCRN should automatically take a screenshot at (if Auto Screenshot is on)

copy-clipboard.name: Copy to Clipboard
copy-clipboard.description: Copy screenshots to the clipboard instead of saving them as a file

hide-player.name: Hide Player Icon
hide-player.description: Hide the player icon in screenshots

hide-ui.name: Hide UI
hide-ui.description: Hide the UI (percentage bar and label, any labels from mods, etc.)
